content: * Caseloads requires Bonterra Case Management to be using Role Based Permissions.  If your Bonterra Case Management is still using Program Based Permissions, please view this article on Record Level Access which provides a similar solution: http://apricot-articles.socialsolutions.com/en/articles/1931616-video-record-level-access-for-users.
